overview_of_class: Introduction to the field of taxation, with attention to individual income taxation. Gross income, capital gains, deductions, and alternate tax methods. IRS forms used.
name: Income Tax I
title: SCS ACCOUNT 208-DL-16 Income Tax I

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Introduction to the field of taxation, with attention to individual income taxation. Gross income, capital gains, deductions, and alternate tax methods. IRS forms used.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
Prerequisite: ACCOUNT 202.
This course is conducted completely online. A technology fee will be added to tuition.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
McGraw-Hill's Taxation of Individuals and Business Entities, 2015 Edition
ISBN: 978-0-07-786236-7

subject: ACCOUNT
